content: 08/27/10 errors have been fix and correctly fixed uploading correct pdf file please accept my apologies for my errors there is an error in the original pattern i am correcting and updating the file in the crotch flap section row 4-5 reads 4-5 repeat 3 round twice it should read 4-5 repeat row 2 twice another error under the cuffs section line 2 & 3 should read 2 double_crochet in each single_crochet around chain 3 and turn 3 *fpdc the next stitch bpdc next stitch* repeat * till the end join with a slip_stitch to the top of the chain 3 finish off the pattern has been corrected to reflect this
